result.markdown:
---
title: "OCMC24"
author: "Vsevolod Suschevskiy"
date: "2024-08-31"
categories: [news, conference]
---


I helped with organization of the [Organizational Communication Mini-Conference at Northwestern University](https://sites.northwestern.edu/ocmc24/) from September 27th to 29th, 2024

Gantt chart chart of some sort for the previous organizers


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.1
✔ ggplot2   3.5.1     ✔ tibble    3.2.1
✔ lubridate 1.9.3     ✔ tidyr     1.3.1
✔ purrr     1.0.2     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- read_csv("ocmc24.csv") |> 
  group_by(university) |> 
  mutate(max_year = max(year)) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  mutate(university = fct_reorder(university, max_year))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 37 Columns: 3
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (2): university, color
dbl (1): year

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
university_colors <- df |> 
  select(university, color) |> 
  unique() |> 
  rename(value = university) |> 
  tibble::deframe()

df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = university, color = university), family="Roboto")+
    geom_vline(xintercept = 1988, linetype = "dashed", color = "grey")+
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 5)+
  geom_line(alpha = 0.5, size = 5)+
  geom_text(aes(label = university), x = 2025, hjust = 0, 
            family="Roboto", size = 12)+
  ggtitle("Who hosted Organizational Communication Mini-Conference?")+
  geom_text(x = 1986, 
            y = 1, 
            label = "OCMC was founded at the UIUC in 1988", 
            color = "grey", angle = 90,
            hjust = 0,  family="Roboto", size = 10)+
  theme_minimal()+
  scale_color_manual(values = university_colors)+
    theme(legend.position = "none",
          axis.text.y=element_blank(),
          axis.title.x=element_blank(),
          axis.title.y=element_blank(),
          panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
          text=element_text(size=24,  family="Roboto"),
          plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.25))+
  # xlim(1990, 2054)+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(seq(1990,2024,5), 2024), 
                     limits = c(1980, 2086)) -> g
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Using `size` aesthetic for lines was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0.
ℹ Please use `linewidth` instead.
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
g
```
